Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Westbound buses are not affected.
